title: Silas Gets a Sister
description: What happens when Big Ole Striped Silas feels sad and lonely, being left home alone each day? He gets a little sister, that's what! The search is on to find Silas some company and a playmate, starting with a trip to the cat show. When those fancy cats don't seem like the right fit, it's the ride home from the show that leads to the perfect friend for Silas. Meet Miss Opal, the runt of the litter who's full of spunk! Available at www.thesilasseries.com
author: Grannie Snow
